title: The essence of modern education
author: VD
content_html:
Derb quotes a reader:

Herding a bunch of kids together against their will to try to teach them the same thing at the same time is one of the dumbest ideas the human race has ever come up with. I say it’s collectivism, and I say to hell with it.

A succinct and accurate summary.
